StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetApplica.onChecklistForNwa]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@NwaID int)
AS
SELECT [NWA_ID] ,[NAVMC10468] ,[MCFAPFIPTAP] ,[ACFNAVMC10469] ,[OFFICIAL_COLLEGE_TRANSCRIPTS] ,[PREVIOUS_SCHOOL_TRANSCRIPTS] ,[ASVAB] ,[PROOF_OF_DEGREE] ,[LAW_SCHOOL_ACCEPTANCE_LETTER] ,[STATE_BAR_NOTIFICATION] ,[INTENT_TO_TRANSFER_TO_4_YR_COLLEGE] ,[DD_FORM_4] ,[ANNEX_A] ,[ANNEX_B] ,[DD214] ,[PREVIOUS_DD4] ,[DD4_DEP_DISCHARGE] ,[SMCR] ,[DD_FORM_368] ,[ROUGH_NAV_MC_763_RFA] ,[COPY_OF_EPSQ] ,[SRB] ,[BIRTH_VERIFICATION] ,[SSN_CARD] ,[NAV_MC_538] ,[DEPENDENCY_STATEMENT] ,[MARRIAGE_LICENSE] ,[NAVMC10418_2] ,[APPLICANT_BRIEFING] ,[RESTRICTIONS] ,[FRATERNIZATION_STATEMENT] ,[USMC_DRUG_POLICY] ,[MEDICAL_INSURANCE] ,[NAV_MC_10418] ,[ADDENDUM_PAGE] ,[DRUG_STATEMENT] ,[MINOR_TRAFFIC_ARREST_FORM] ,[NON_TRAFFIC_ARREST_FORM] ,[PFT] ,[PHOTO_PAGE] ,[TATOO_PHOTO] ,[DD785] ,[BODY_FAT_PHOTO] ,[BODY_FAT_MEASUREMENT] ,[HUNDRED_WORD_STATEMENT] ,[OSO_EVALUATION_NAV_MC_10064] ,[PIQ] ,[DEAN] ,[PRF1] ,[PRF2] ,[EMPLOYER] ,[OTHER1] ,[OTHER2] ,[I_AND_I] ,[PRINTS] ,[ROTC] ,[USER_LOGIN] FROM [dbo].[APPLICATION_CHECKLIST] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE [NWA_ID] = @NwaID
